ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T02:42:02 [Issue ID 4000-530601] urn:comicvine:4000-530601
ComicInfo.Summary: Lady Death concludes this story arc with this all-out, epic battle issue! Surviving the magical energies of the Fanghorn river, Lady Death has a new-found awareness of the Blacklands and learns that Satasha's home-city of Abberfaw is next on Sagos' conquest list. If Abberfaw falls, the Blacklands will fall. Can Lady Death, Wargoth and Satasha survive Hemlock and other assorted evils Sagos has in store for them? Much more, how can they overcome the seemingly limitless power of Sagos himself? Originally presented in Lady Death: Abandon All Hope #4.
